definitions.definition: take (something) away or off from the position occupied.
examples: Customs officials removed documents from the premises
he sat down and quickly removed his shoes and socks

definitions.definition: change one's home or place of residence by moving to (another place).
examples: he removed to Mexico and began afresh

definitions.definition: compel (someone) by law to move to another area.
examples: a man is removed to the tribal district of his forbears
the iron can be removed by filtration

definitions.definition: dismiss from a job or office.
examples: he was removed from his teaching position
it is an isolated place, far removed from the London art world
an explanation that is far removed from the truth
synonyms: outside of "it's a fairy tale completely removed from reality"

definitions.definition: separated by a particular number of steps of descent.
